settings.question: Why the name 'Ruth'?
settings.answer: The name Ruth is special to us because we wanted to pay tribute to Ruth Bader Ginsburg, a powerful role model who fought for social justice, equality, and female empowerment. We, at Ruth, are ruthlessly fighting with you to save the Earth one sustainable product at a time.

settings.question: Where are your pads manufactured?
settings.answer: Our pads are manufactured in India in accordance with fair manufacturing practices - which includes fair wages and safe working conditions for employees. We use carbon-neutral shipping to transport our products to Canada.
